fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ProducerWrapper with 8 test cases covering constructor validation, message production, error handling, and disposal scenarios
recommendations: Consider adding more robust error handling in writeMessage method
Implement logging instead of Console.WriteLine for better testability
Add configuration options for timeout and error handling

fileReports.summary: Generated comprehensive test suite for ProcessOrdersService with 4 test scenarios covering constructor initialization, message processing, order handling, and error scenarios
